quotes.text: The most important step a man can take. It's not the first one, is it? It's the next one.
The purpose of a storyteller is not to tell you how to think, but to give you questions to think upon.
The destination is important, but so is the journey. And what you learn along the way.
Words are where most change begins.

quotes.source: The First Ideal of the Knights Radiant

quotes.text: Life breaks us, Teft. Then we fill the cracks with something stronger.
The pain is what shapes us, after all.
The most important step a man can take. It's not the first one, is it? It's the next one.
The stars are beautiful, because of a flower that cannot be seen.
The only thing that changes is how we perceive it.
Expectation is the mother of disappointment.
I will protect those who cannot protect themselves.
quotes.source: The Second Ideal of the Windrunners
